description.content: I worked at Dinant that is a company that was established in Honduras, and is focused on the manufacturing, distribution, and marketing of worldwide known Latino products. I was given the role of a Full-Stack developer and received several tasks meant to reduce the amount of repetitive procedures by creating sites where they can input values with ease and run the process which used to take time, and now in less than a minute.

Trabaje en Dinant el cual es una compania que fue establesida en Honduras, y su enfoque es la manufactura, distribucion, y mercadeo de productos Latinos reconocidos mundialmente. Se me otorgo el rol de desarrollador Full-Stack y fui encargado varios projectos destinado a reducir procedimientos repetitivos al crear paginas web donde pueden ingresar valores con facilidad y correr procesos que soliad tomar tiempo, y ahora en menos de un minuto.

info.content: Full-Stack Development, Data Transformation, Oracle Database, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Data Entry, Data Analysis, Data Modeling
Full-Stack Development, Data Transformation, Oracle Database, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Data Entry, Data Analysis, Data Modeling
